content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) and inserter (position y1) that puts iron ore into the furnace
- Stone furnace (position x2) and inserter (position y2) that puts iron ore into the furnace
- Stone furnace (position x3) and inserter (position y3) that puts coal into the furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available for insertion before attempting to insert items. Check if the furnace is already processing or if it has enough space for the items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has finished processing. Check the status of the furnace before extraction to avoid unnecessary errors.

### Errors when using entities on the map
- Ensure that you are aware of the current state of entities on the map. Regularly check for any stale or unresponsive entities that may affect your actions.
